entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. 30 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 15 inland. POP 30%
